name: phan/fake-paratest-runner
description: A paratest runner for phan. This is not a supported paratest configuration
x-comment: - **Phan's paratest configuration is not supported by paratest's maintainers - if you encounter issues, run vendor/bin/phpunit instead.** (The separate paratest installation is a kludgy workaround so that other dependencies in Phan's main composer.lock such as composer/semver are not held back)
